english: They openly declare themselves as atheists .
chinese: 他们公开宣布自己是无神论者。

english: No, bertha, if you're an atheist i can have nothing more to do with you .
chinese: 不，伯莎，如果你是个无神论者，我不能再和你交往。

english: I have heard a very famous antitheist
chinese: 我曾听说过一个非常著名的无神论者。

english: You sound more iike a mystic than an agnostic
chinese: 你听起来像是个神秘论者，而不是无神论者
无神论者造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I do not want any damned atheists on this raid
chinese: 我希望这次偷袭行动中没有该死的无神论者

english: His wife converted him from christianity to atheism
chinese: 他的太太使他由基督徒改为无神论者。

english: Both the atheist and the religionist seem to be right
chinese: 无神论者和宗教人士似乎都是对的。

english: I believe that there is no god , so i am an atheist
chinese: 我不信仰上帝，所以我是一个无神论者。

english: Atheism : i don ' t believe this shit
chinese: 无神论者:我绝不相信这种霉运的存在

english: I believe that there is no god , so i am an atheist
chinese: 我不信仰上帝，所以我是一个无神论者。

english: Well how about some of you that are agnostics
chinese: 那些不可知论者又如何呢？无神论者又如何呢？

english: To others it s not atheism it s more agnosticism
chinese: 另一些人，不是无神论者，较倾向不可知论。

english: Well then , how could he become an atheist
chinese: 那他怎会成为无神论者呢？

english: The world is till waiting for the first wise atheist
chinese: 到如今，世界仍在等候一位聪明的无神论者。
